text: Hi guys! Iâ€™m looking for some help... We published our first templates on the marketplace. For each one, we provided a link towards a demo page which is published on our main domain. For this reason, I would like these pages not to be indexed so that no one can find them in the SERPs and it does not affect our website rankings. How do you deal with that? Thanks a lot!:pray:
add this to the head of each of those pages `<meta name="robots" content="noindex">`
or use the robots.txt to disallow those links

hi <@U7V9DQ31P> thx for your help! I did that. I was wondering if some of you had a specific process to publish marketplace demo pages or if there is a trick to avoid keeping them in our main HS portal (publishing on another domain for instance?) . Anyway, this will do the trick, thanks Stefen!
You can also remove them from the sitemap as well.
I think ideally, you'd create a subdomain for each template pack. But I believe that requires an Enterprise plan.
